name: Minigame Mayhem (GilesGameDesign)
description:
Minigame Mayhem – What is it ?

Minigame Mayhem is a four player local multiplayer game, which is a collection of minigames where players can compete against one another.  Battle your friends in games such as Sumo Slam and Dippy Dodgeball, avoid getting squished in Falling Fruits, outwit the infected in Vampire Tag, race to be the first to finish the Obstacle course or aim to be the last one standing in Colour Shuffle.

Developers Notes:

Thank you for playing our game, we hope you enjoyed it.

We have a bunch of known bugs, listed below, that we have not yet ironed out.  However, should you find any more please feel free to let us know.

Menus

When using a gamepad, the buttons in the UI can sometimes break, testing is still being done to identify the exact cause. The mouse can be used to access these buttons when they stop working for you.

For example: Pausing the game can cause it not to resume without mouse intervention in some scenarios.

Gameplay

Currently there is an issue with the characters not keeping their initial colour.  Due to this, the scoring which was proposed has not been implemented so that eventually you will be able to see who is the King or Queen of the Minigames … or the Joker.

Freeplay and Party Selection

These modes can break after one or two goes where the level select screen no longer works. Unfortunately, reloading the game is currently the only fix.

There is also a strange issue with the Party Selection mode where you will play the same minigame twice in a row even though it shouldn’t be possible.

 

For the best gameplay experience we recommend Party Shuffle and why not go for Shuffle 7.

As you play, you may come across our coming soon levels, work is ongoing with these, but we will look to provide them as soon as possible.

 

Any feedback you may have for us will be welcomed, but for now go and have yourself some Minigame Mayhem.
